CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE flights
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://hallinc@hallincdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/flights/parquet/'
);

SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Year=2013/Month=*/DayofMonth=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'flights',
        FORMAT = 'parquet'  
    ) AS flights
WHERE 
    flights.filepath(1) = '10'
;
